Name: allergic conjunctivitis
Definition: A chronic conjunctivitis that is an inflammation of the conjunctiva involing red

Name: chronic follicular conjunctivitis
Definition: A (-)ssRNA virus infectious disease that results_in infection in rodents and humans
Synonym: Mast cell malignancy of lymph nodes of inguinal region and lower limb (disorder)

Name: parasitic conjunctivitis
Definition: A dsRNA virus infectious disease that results_in infection in animals and humans

Name: obsolete Toxoplasma pneumonia
Definition: A toxoplasmosis that is caused by the protozoan Toxoplasma gondii which is recognized as pathogen in immunocompromised patients. Microscopy of the lung shows fibrinous exudate

Name: obsolete ocular toxoplasmosis
Definition: A toxoplasmosis that results from reactivation of congenital toxoplasmosis

Name: vernal conjunctivitis
Definition: A systemic mycosis that results_in fungal infection located_in human body of immunocompromised individuals

Name: simple chronic conjunctivitis
Definition: A sinusitis which involves infection of ethmoid sinuses that causes pain or pressure behind and between the eyes
